title: I used to joke about T-Mobile's network — now I use it more than AT&T
full_text: I used to joke about T-Mobile's network — now I use it more than AT&T. I switched over and love the results. It doesnt feel like long ago that I would joke with family and friends that T-Mobile is fine unless you like using your phone indoors. But times (and networks) have changed. Ive used AT&T Wirele… [+5421 chars]
